title: No Lies for 24 Hours
description: Make it through one full day without a single lie — not even a small one.

title: Truth Audit
description: Before sleeping, review your conversations. Were you fully honest? Reflect and write in your journal.

title: Correct a Past Lie
description: Reach out to someone and correct something dishonest you’ve said before. Seek Allah’s forgiveness.

title: Leave the Room (Literally or Virtually)
description: If someone starts backbiting, remove yourself — respectfully. One-time challenge.

title: Defend Their Honour
description: Say one good thing about someone being backbitten. Flip the tone of the conversation.

title: Fast From Gossip
description: For the next 3 hours, no gossip. No stories about anyone else. See how long you can last.

title: Pause Before You Speak
description: Any time you speak today, pause for 3 seconds before repeating something about someone else.

title: Delete the Message
description: Delete a message or post that could misrepresent someone, even slightly. Don’t spread doubt.

title: Say 'I Don’t Know'
description: When unsure, say 'I don’t know' today. Resist the urge to fill gaps with assumptions.

title: Be the Gentle One
description: Speak kindly today. Avoid all sarcasm, imitations, and subtle mocking.

title: Silent Smile
description: Today, when tempted to joke at someone’s expense — smile instead. Let it pass.

title: Compliment the One You Mock
description: Think of someone you’ve mocked. Privately make dua for them. Optionally, offer praise to their face.

title: Three Sacred Silences
description: For today, find 3 moments to consciously be silent when you would normally speak unnecessarily.

title: Intentional Speech Week
description: For 7 days, try to speak only when you have clear purpose or benefit. Reflect at day’s end.

title: Silent Mornings
description: For the next 3 days, remain silent after Fajr until breakfast unless necessary.

title: Truthful Compliments Only
description: Today, only give compliments you mean. No flattery. No exaggeration.

title: Authenticity Practice – 7 Days
description: Avoid insincere compliments or strategic praise for 7 days. Honour truth in every word.

title: 14-Day Praise Cleanse
description: For 14 days, be mindful of any praise you offer. Let it be genuine and spiritually safe.

title: Zip the Lips
description: Do not reveal anything personal you know about others for 24 hours. Not even hints.

title: Safeguard the Trust
description: For 7 days, reflect on whether you speak from trust. Record slips and ask Allah for restraint.

title: Honour the Private
description: If you’ve recently shared something private, contact that person to affirm your trust.

title: Refined Language Day
description: No swearing, rough words, or aggressive tone for 24 hours. Use words of mercy and dignity.

title: Speak Like a Believer – 7 Days
description: For a full week, monitor your speech tone and purity. Use reminders and daily du‘a for control.

title: 14-Day Clean Speech Reset
description: Avoid all profanity, innuendo, or hostile tone for 14 days. Let your words carry the fragrance of mercy.

title: Let It Go (Once)
description: Walk away from one argument today — even if you’re right. Choose peace over ego.

title: 7 Days of Calm Speech
description: Refrain from raising your voice or arguing for 7 days. Choose stillness over combativeness.

title: 14-Day Dispute Detox
description: Avoid all disputes — verbal, online, or passive-aggressive — for 14 days. Replace with du‘a.
